1367800.name: animARide Parser & Editor
1367800.description:
animARide Parser & Editor has two tools to create data file for app animARide and many other apps, like Dashware, etc.
First tool extracts GPMF motion data from GoPro camcorders: Hero 5+, Fusion and MAX at 100Hz frequency by three axes:
  • Accelerometer, m/s²
  • Gyroscope, rad/s
  • Angles, degrees
  • Speed, m/s
  • Magnetometer, µT
Second tool edits data file .4DR, created by upper tool, or by our app for iOS "animARide MVC". Following settings can be edited and saved:
  • Cutting out data rows, according Time Code value, after edition of parent video
  • Changing the angles, separately by each axis, on a constant value
  • Adjusting Sensitivity of motion for angles re-calculation
  • Inversion of angles, in case wrong camera orientation
